column4: I'm in a bit of trouble here guys... ubuntu karmic amd64 and it'll only let me switch tasks once. After that, I need to ALT+F4 to close the application (it won't let me click the close button) or I can't use anything except the application that has focus
a bunch of things from psmouse.c retry
you want me to copy/paste in your privates?
you're using LIVE or did you installed it?
well you came here looking for help, I'm doing a few research to imagine the scenario you're working on, if you don't need help why are you here?
press alt f2 the run gksu gnome-display-properties
it can be a bug in you video-driver , and the "desktop effects" are causing a bug in your window manager
can you switch between apps now?
heh, I run sudo apt-get update & upgrade every day if that's what you mean
uh... yeah, tahts helps to but, sometimes a update may crash your system just by adding something to where it shoudnt,
